name: The Moral Sword of Asagi
description:
Overview:
Moral swordfighter Asagi is a vanquisher of rascals!

How does she and her team fare against sexual harassment?
Ravished! Violated! Imprisoned and sex trained!

Lots of erotic scenes flesh out this indie RPG.
Battle badly and get screwed! Same goes for party members!
Can Asagi and friends defeat the rascals?​
